title: Beaver Banged My Butt
description: An unprecedented concentration of erotic talent has given rise to strange happenings in the Canadian wilderness. Four regular dudes set out to spend some time in Ontario's Algonquin Park. When a mysterious man interrupts his camping trip, former ladies' man Blake enters his lodge and reluctantly gives in to the unexpected gay excitement. An erotic short story featuring a beer and a were-beaver. Intended for adults only.
author: Mecha Dahl
